dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 365 IH: Territorial Tax Parity Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Plaskett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the residence and source rules to provide for economic recovery in the possessions of the United States.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Territorial Tax Parity Act of 2025.

section.header: Modification to source rules involving possessions

subsection.text: Section 937(b)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by inserting , but only to the extent such income is attributable to an office or fixed place of business within the United States (determined under the rules of section 864(c)(5)) before the period at the end.

subsection.header: Source rules for personal property sales
subsection.text: Section 865(j)(3) of such Code is amended by inserting , 932, after 931.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
